projects.title: Complex Systems and Emergent Behaviors
projects.description: Investigating the dynamics of interconnected systems and emergent collective behaviors. We explore how simple interaction rules give rise to sophisticated system-level phenomena, with applications to distributed intelligence and adaptive networks.

projects.title: Chemical AI
projects.description: Developing machine learning methods at the interface of chemistry and artificial intelligence. This work focuses on using AI to predict molecular properties, design novel compounds, and understand chemical reaction mechanisms.

projects.title: Game Theory with Deep Learning
projects.description: Applying deep reinforcement learning to game theoretic problems. We study strategic interactions in multi-agent environments, equilibrium concepts, and the emergence of cooperative and competitive behaviors in learned policies.

projects.title: LLMs in Multi-Agent Systems
projects.description: Exploring how large language models interact in multi-agent settings. This research examines communication protocols, coordination mechanisms, and emergent linguistic behaviors when multiple language models collaborate or compete.
